text: Hildburghausen is a district in Thuringia, Germany. It covers most of the same territory as the old Ernestine duchy of Saxe-Hildburghausen. == Coat of arms == The coat of arms displays: * the heraldic lion of Meißen * the cock representing the counts of Henneberg, who ruled the region until 1583 * below the symbol of the bishopric of Würzburg is displayed == Towns and municipalities == Verwaltungsgemeinschaft-free towns and municipalities # Eisfeld # Hildburghausen # Schleusingen # Themar # Auengrund # Bockstadt # Brünn # Gleichamberg # Masserberg # Nahetal-Waldau # Sachsenbrunn # Sankt Kilian # Schleusegrund # Straufhain # Veilsdorf Verwaltungsgemeinschaften Verwaltungsgemeinschaften Verwaltungsgemeinschaften 1\. Feldstein [seat: Themar] # Ahlstädt # Beinerstadt # Bischofrod # Dingsleben # Ehrenberg # Eichenberg # Grimmelshausen # Grub # Henfstädt # Kloster Veßra # Lengfeld # Marisfeld # Oberstadt # Reurieth # Sankt Bernhard # Schmeheim 2\.
